description: This file contains Flutter widget components related to note-taking, including a list display of notes, a modal to show note details, and a search bar widget.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A widget that displays a list of notes with options to tap, edit, or delete each note.

classes.name: SearchBarWidget
classes.description: A widget providing a text input field for searching notes.

methods.name: showNoteDetailModal
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet with detailed information about a specific note.
